This page offers downloads for the legacy release version, BioJava 1.30

BioJava code

  • Binary for J2SE 1.4 or later
  • Binary for J2SE 1.3
  • API documentation
  • Source code

Required libraries

  • bytecode.jar
  • jakarta-regexp.jar
  • xerces.jar

Xerces and Jakarta-regexp are covered by the Apache license.

Getting older versions

Older releases of BioJava can be found in the download area.
